person.persName: Samuel L. Christie (Cincinnati, Ohio,1st lieut & capt 1st Ky Inf USA)

body.p: Cincinnati, Ohio soldier. Married to Eva P. Christie. Served in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as first lieutenant from May 10, 1861, to November 5, 1862. Served in detached service to Brigadier General J. D. Cox in western Virginia from July 23, 1861, to November 5, 1862. Served in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as captain from November 5, 1862, to August 12, 1863.
